content_writing.name: Content Writing
content_writing.description: Create engaging content for blogs, social media, and newsletters

business_marketing.name: Business & Marketing
business_marketing.description: Professional content for business and marketing needs

creative_writing.name: Creative Writing
creative_writing.description: Fiction, poetry, and creative content generation

research_analysis.name: Research & Analysis
research_analysis.description: Data analysis, market research, and competitive intelligence

content_writing.name: Blog Post Creator
content_writing.description: Generate comprehensive blog posts on any topic
content_writing.template: Write a comprehensive blog post about {topic}. Include an engaging introduction, 3-5 main points with subheadings, practical examples, and a compelling conclusion. Make it informative yet engaging for general readers.

content_writing.name: Social Media Post
content_writing.template: Create a compelling social media post about {topic}. Include relevant hashtags, an attention-grabbing hook, and a clear call-to-action. Keep it under 300 characters and make it shareable.

content_writing.name: Email Newsletter
content_writing.template: Write a professional email newsletter about {topic}. Include a friendly greeting, 3-4 main sections with valuable insights, and a warm closing. Make it informative but not overwhelming.

business_marketing.name: Product Description
business_marketing.template: Write a compelling product description for {product}. Focus on benefits, include technical specifications, address potential objections, and create urgency. Target audience: {target_audience}.

business_marketing.name: Marketing Strategy
business_marketing.template: Create a comprehensive marketing strategy for {product_service}. Include target audience analysis, positioning, channel recommendations, budget allocation, and success metrics.

business_marketing.name: Sales Email
business_marketing.template: Write a persuasive sales email for {product}. Include a compelling subject line, address the prospect's pain point, present the solution, include social proof, and end with a clear call-to-action.

creative_writing.name: Story Generator
creative_writing.template: Write an engaging short story based on these elements: {genre}, {setting}, {main_character}, and {conflict}. Include a compelling beginning, character development, rising action, climax, and satisfying resolution.

creative_writing.name: Character Development
creative_writing.template: Create a detailed character profile for {character_name}. Include their background, personality traits, motivations, fears, goals, dialogue style, and how they might evolve throughout a story.

creative_writing.name: Poetry Creator
creative_writing.template: Write a {poetry_form} poem about {topic}. Use {tone_mood} tone, incorporate imagery related to {theme}, and make it resonate with the intended emotional response.

technical_development.name: Code Reviewer
technical_development.template: Review the following {language} code and provide specific improvement suggestions: {code}. Focus on: readability, performance, security, best practices, and potential bugs. Provide before/after examples.

technical_development.name: Documentation Writer
technical_development.template: Write clear, comprehensive documentation for {software_feature}. Include: overview, installation instructions, usage examples, API reference, and troubleshooting guide. Use simple language for non-technical users.

technical_development.name: Bug Debugger
technical_development.template: Help debug this code: {code_problem}. Identify the root cause, explain why it's happening, and provide a complete solution with explanation. Also suggest prevention strategies.

research_analysis.name: Market Research
research_analysis.template: Conduct comprehensive market research on {industry_product}. Include: market size, growth trends, key players, consumer behavior, opportunities, threats, and strategic recommendations.

research_analysis.name: Data Analysis
research_analysis.template: Analyze the following data: {data}. Identify key patterns, trends, and insights. Provide visualizations suggestions, statistical analysis, and actionable recommendations based on the findings.

research_analysis.name: Competitor Analysis
research_analysis.template: Perform a comprehensive competitor analysis for {competitor}. Include: strengths, weaknesses, market positioning, pricing strategy, unique value propositions, and areas where we can differentiate.
